name: places/ChIJz2oPb5RYwokRvFslmG4-oII
adrFormatAddress: 956 5th Ave, New York, NY 10075-1737, USA

originalText.text: Most amazing, kind hearted doctor. He treated my baby with a deep,  bad, bad double cuts on his forehead and the is close to no scar!!  And he was so on top of things. Wonderful doctor. Like him, are few and far apart! Har to find a doctor like him! Followed up after the stitching every step in the way!

Like him, are few and far apart! Har to find a doctor like him! Followed up after the stitching every step in the way!

originalText.text: Amazing plastic surgeon. He stitched my son’s forehead after it was glued and the glue didn’t hold. He had amazing bedside manner with my 4 year old and made himself available for any questions after our visit. Taking out the stitches was quick and painless - highly recommend Dr. Wolf!

text.text: Amazing plastic surgeon. He stitched my son’s forehead after it was glued and the glue didn’t hold. He had amazing bedside manner with my 4 year old and made himself available for any questions after our visit. Taking out the stitches was quick and painless - highly recommend Dr. Wolf!

originalText.text: Came in to treat me on the lower east side on new yrs night to treat my broken nose.   The guy was really great, confident, relaxed and easy going.  I def felt very comfortable with him and couldn't believe he came just to take care of me.   Also he even took my number, followed up with me days later to check in on me, suggesting what I should do and additional things I could do to help my nose heal/look like new.  Def a 5/5 for sure.   Won't find too many guys like Dr.Wolf.

originalText.text: Doctor Wolf made my bad experience very well. I had cut my thumb with a glass and bleeding for a couple of hours. Not being from NY and living out of state I was scared. Not only was I scared but I never had gotten stitches before. The ER doctor had told me orginaly she was just going to glue it shut. However, DR.Wolf didn’t like that idea and decided to give me stitches. Nervous as ever he was called in to come to Beth Israel Mount Sinai. He came in and acted as if he was my friend not my doctor. He examined me and decided I didn’t need to have nail taken off as I also cut through the nail. He left my room in the ER and then came back with some supplies for the stitches. I was super nervous he numbed my thumb and then began the stitches. Throughout the whole time we spoke about college and all types of different topics to keep my mind of the stitches and DR. Wolf just kept telling me you will be fine. He really did try and make me feel at eaze. Four days after the incident and I am holding up I can’t thank him enough for his great bed side manner. I also liked the fact that he also gave me his cell phone number and told me not to hesitate to call if I needed anything or had any questions. I will write another review after I visit him again to have my stitches removed. Overall awesome doctor and explains everything too you.

originalText.text:
The nicest, most empathetic, compassionate doctor you will ever meet.

Dr. Wolf listens to your concerns, gives you the best plan to follow AND gives you reasoning as to why.  Most medical professionals in my experience fail to do the last.  He's a gem.

Positive and professional.  His receptionist is also wonderful!
